name: Unriddle
headline: AI for researchers, students and scientists
description:
We build tools to help people think and work better.

Today, Unriddle helps researchers and students quickly find insights in documents, video and audio so they can learn and write faster. 

We started working on Unriddle 18 months ago. In that time:
- we’ve grown to 3M users spanning hundreds of major colleges and research-led companies,
- we hit $1.5M in yearly revenue and are fast approaching our next milestone of $2M,
- 100M+ people have seen our content across Instagram, TikTok and YouTube,
- and we raised a $2.4M seed with checks from YC and the founders of Github and Reddit.

Looking ahead, we're expanding beyond just summarization and writing assistance to address the broader challenges of information overload faced by researchers and students.

We're a small, tight-knit team with huge ambitions. As a founding member of the team, you'll be instrumental in helping us scale revenue from $1M to $10M and then $10M to $100M+.

If you’re excited by the idea of being a part of that, definitely apply.

founders.name: Naveed Janmohamed, Founder
founders.description: Naveed graduated top of his class from University College London with a master’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction. He has 10+ years of experience in product design and HCI research. He built and grew Unriddle to $800K ARR entirely solo before making his first hire.

# Unriddle is AI for researchers, students and scientists
Quickly understand papers, books, and lectures, write and cite with AI, and keep everything organized.
Get Unriddle free[Contact Sales](https://www.unriddle.ai/<https:/tally.so/r/wbO0j0>)
Trusted by 2,500,000+ academics
![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/caltech-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/cambridge-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/amazon-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/gsk-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/reckitt-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/stanford-logo.svg)![logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/pwc-logo.svg)
![Main Section Poster](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhero.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Understand
Clear, actionable and accurate explanations in milliseconds
Understand any PDF, image, audio recording or video with our AI assistant. Ask questions to quickly find the information you need.
![Clear, actionable and accurate explanations in milliseconds](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Funderstand.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Referenced responses
We always show you where information was sourced from so you can quickly verify AI accuracy.
Collections
Add multiple sources into one assistant for quick cross-referencing and search, making literature reviews easy.
Convert handwriting
Our AI can understand handwritten, scanned and poorly formatted documents.
![Clear, actionable and accurate explanations in milliseconds](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Funderstand.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Write
Cite, write, and edit faster with a little help from AI
Write compelling and effective content that resonates with your audience. Never write alone again.
![Cite, write, and edit faster with a little help from AI](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fwrite.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Find citations
Instantly discover relevant papers, books and websites based on the contents of your writing.
Edit with AI
Paraphrase, improve and summarize text, ensuring your content remains engaging and informative.
AI autocomplete
Unriddle includes a powerful autocomplete that predicts your next edit so you can speed through writers block
![Cite, write, and edit faster with a little help from AI](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fwrite.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
## What people are saying
“As a PhD candidate, Unriddle is my number one app for annotations, lit reviews and manuscripts.”
Tylar
PhD Student
![Stanford Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/stanford-logo.svg)
“With Unriddle, I’m able to do in 30 mins what used to take 3 hours. There’s nothing else like it.”
Paul
Research Scientist
![Biogen Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/biogen-logo.svg)
“Interacting with documents on Unriddle is like speaking to the team who wrote the research paper. It’s fantastic.”
Michael
Physician
![Cedars Sinai Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/cedars-sinai-logo.svg)
“I'm using Unriddle AI right now for my research into single-cell multiomics frameworks, and it's amazing!”
Zeyu
Lab Assistant
![Berkeley Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/berkeley-logo.svg)
“Unriddle makes diving into research papers so much easier and quicker. A must-try tool.”
Alamin
Dermatologist
![Mayo Clinic Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/mayo-clinic-logo.svg)
“I've tried a lot of Al research apps, and Unriddle is so far ahead in simplicity, quality, and speed!”
Filip
Data Scientist
![Intel Logo](https://www.unriddle.ai/images/landing/logos/intel-logo.svg)
Collaborate
Get your research team closer together and moving faster
Expand the Unriddle system with collaborative features that keep everyone on the team aligned and focused.
![Get your research team closer together and moving faster](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fcollaborate.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Collaborative editing
Work on documents simultaneously with instant, real-time collaboration.
Shared repository
Consolidate documents into one centralized repository for easy access.
Manage access
Control user permissions and manage team access with admin tools.
![Get your research team closer together and moving faster](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fcollaborate.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
## All the bells and whistles
Record
Record and chat with lectures. Ask questions to clarify, find and summarize content.
Dark mode
Choose between light and dark modes. An interface that’s always easy on the eyes. 
![Dark mode](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flanding%2Fdark-mode.png&w=2048&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)
Search with AI
Find information across your entire library. Ask questions, get answers, find files instantly.
In every major language
Select from 90+ languages including French, Spanish, Hindi, Chinese and many more.
Graph view
Automatically map your files into an interactive graph so you can find hidden patterns.
Enterprise
HIPAA compliance, single sign-on (SSO), advanced admin controls, priority support and more.
Webpage summaries
Get the gist of any webpage with just one click using our Chrome extension.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### What is Unriddle?
### Do you offer a free trial?
### Can I trust Unriddle to provide accurate answers?
### What file types does Unriddle support?
### What is your refund policy?
[More FAQs](https://www.unriddle.ai/</faqs>)
## Get started for free
Take Unriddle for a spin today. No card required.
[Get Unriddle free](https://www.unriddle.ai/</login>)
![test](https://www.unriddle.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffooter-asset.png&w=1920&q=75&dpl=dpl_2Rsg4Cofju5ZfWVvYfsxpjTY7Mqb)

generated_description:
Unriddle is a promising startup with a clear mission: to leverage AI for enhancing the research capabilities of students, scientists, and academics. Founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Unriddle started out with the idea of building tools to help people think and work better. In just 18 months, they've made impressive strides—growing to 3 million users across major colleges and research institutions, generating $1.5 million in annual revenue, and catching the attention of notable investors including YC and the founders of GitHub and Reddit.

At its core, Unriddle provides a suite of AI-driven solutions that help users swiftly glean insights from documents, videos, and audio materials. Whether you're trying to write faster, manage citations, or convert handwriting, their tools promise clear and actionable results in an instant. The platform supports various formats like PDFs and audio recordings, making it an adaptable ally for diverse academic needs. 

But they're not stopping there. Unriddle is addressing the broader issue of information overload that many researchers face. They plan to expand their offerings beyond just summarization and writing assistance, increasing the value they provide to their user base.

The company currently operates with a small, passionate team of five, and they have strong ambitions to scale further, eyeing revenue milestones of $10 million and beyond. Their growth trajectory is bolstered by the visibility they've gained on social media, with over 100 million people engaging with their content across platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

In essence, Unriddle is making waves in the EdTech and AI spheres—transforming how research is conducted and empowering its users to work smarter, not harder. So if the thought of diving into AI for academia excites you, it might just be the perfect time to get involved with Unriddle as they continue to shape the future of research. For more insights, check out their website at [Unriddle](https://www.unriddle.ai/).
